To install and run JDBC bridge in background: * [Debian/Ubuntu] export MVN_URL=https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/clickhouse/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge/ export PKG_VER=$(curl -sL $MVN_URL/maven-metadata.xml | grep '<release>' | sed -e 's|.*>\(.*\)<.*|\1|') wget https://github.com/ClickHouse/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge/releases/download/v$PKG_VER/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge_$PKG_VER-1_all.deb apt install --no-install-recommends -f ./clickhouse-jdbc-bridge_$PKG_VER-1_all.deb clickhouse-jdbc-bridge &
* [CentOS/RHEL] export MVN_URL=https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/clickhouse/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge/ export PKG_VER=$(curl -sL $MVN_URL/maven-metadata.xml | grep '<release>' | sed -e 's|.*>\(.*\)<.*|\1|') wget https://github.com/ClickHouse/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge/releases/download/v$PKG_VER/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge-$PKG_VER-1.noarch.rpm yum localinstall -y clickhouse-jdbc-bridge-$PKG_VER-1.noarch.rpm clickhouse-jdbc-bridge &
Please refer to https://github.com/ClickHouse/clickhouse-jdbc-bridge#usage for more information.
